sentences.sContent: The branch split under their weight.
sentences.sCn: 树枝承受不住他们的重量断裂了。

sentences.sContent: In a severe gale the ship split in two.
sentences.sCn: 在一次强劲的大风中那艘船断成了两半。

sentences.sContent: If the chicken is fairly small, you may simply split it in half.
sentences.sCn: 要是鸡不太大，你把它分成两半就行。

sentences.sContent: ...Observers are split on whether this is a wholly good thing...
...the split in our economy is really between two other classes: the mobile and immobile...
...there is the phenomenon of large urban and suburban high schools that have split up into smaller units of a few hundred...

exam.question: His trousers _____ when he tried to jump over the fence.

answer.explain: 句意： 他在奋力跃过篱笆的时候把裤子撕裂了。crack： 爆裂， 断裂； break： 打破， 断开； burst： 爆炸， 胀破。

phrases.pCn: 斤斤计较，在小事上争论不休；作无益的、琐碎的分析
香蕉圣代（剖开香蕉夹以冰淇淋等）；香蕉半剖条

remMethod.val: “死劈了它” → 劈开 → 分裂

words.tran: 极快的；爆裂似的，剧烈的；滑稽的
分离机，分流器；分解器，拆分器

trans.tranOther: If something splits or if you split it, it is divided into two or more parts
